title: The Legend of the Trung Sisters
itunes:title: The Legend of the Trung Sisters
description:
Two sisters raised an army in 1st century Vietnam against Chinese colonialists. Over the next two thousand years, their story would change and twist. Support Noble Blood:

— Bonus episodes, stickers, and scripts on Patreon

— Merch!

— Order Dana's book, 'Anatomy: A Love Story' and pre-order its sequel 'Immortality: A Love Story'

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
